00021         mboolean Dictionary::setValue(maven::Object* key, maven::Object* value) {
00022                 catchNilObjectException(key, return false);
00023                 catchNilObjectException(value, return false);
00024                 
00025                 // if the key already exists, just update the value
00026                 DictionaryItem* cursor = d;
00027                 while(cursor != NULL) {
00028                         if(!strcmp(cursor->key->toString()->s, key->toString()->s)) {
00029                                 cursor->value = value;
00030                                 return true;
00031                         }
00032                         cursor = cursor->next;
00033                 }
00034                 
00035                 // this means the item wasn't found, stick it on the end of the stack
00036                 ++len;
00037                 if(d == NULL) {
00038                         d = new DictionaryItem(key, value);
00039                         last = d;
00040                         return true;
00041                 }
00042                 
00043                 last->next = new DictionaryItem(key, value);
00044                 last = last->next;
00045                 return true;
00046         }
00047         
00048         maven::Object* Dictionary::getValue(maven::Object* key) {
00049                 catchNilObjectException(key, return new maven::Object());
00050                 
00051                 DictionaryItem* cursor = d;
00052                 while(cursor != NULL) {
00053                         if(!strcmp(cursor->key->toString()->s, key->toString()->s))
00054                                 return cursor->value;
00055                         cursor = cursor->next;
00056                 }
00057                 return new maven::Object();
00058         }
